alert.note: Alert for Boone; Greene; Hamilton; Marshall; Story; Webster; Wright (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 10:29PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Greene, Story, western Marshall, Hardin, southeastern Webster, southeastern Wright, southern Franklin, Boone and Hamilton Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1028 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Webster City to near Perry. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Webster City around 1035 PM CDT. Jewell Junction around 1040 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Woodward, Madrid, Slater, Iowa Falls, Iowa State Center, Huxley, Nevada and Eldora. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 102 and 156. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central, north central and west central Iowa. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central Iowa.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Greene; Hamilton; Marshall; Story; Webster; Wright
